prompts: Create a metallic Pokemon that has a humanoid form and features rocky arms.
I want a Pokemon that combines steel and rock attributes with a unique color palette.
Generate an image of a Pokemon resembling a robot with a powerful build and bright eyes.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a golem, with a shiny golden core and rocky exterior.
Imagine a Pokemon with a mix of steel and rock types, showcasing strength and durability.
Design a Pokemon that stands tall with a combination of gray and gold colors.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies toughness and resilience with a striking visual presence.
